channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Chip Manufacturer Cuts Revenue Forecast Due to Weak Demand for Crypto Miners, Again
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Alexandre
item.description: Global semiconductor manufacturer TSMC has agained lowered its annual revenue forecast due to slowing demand from cryptocurrency miners

item.title: HSBC Global Head of Digital Says the Bank Is ‘Cautiously Looking’ at Crypto Investment
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Alexandre
item.description: HSBC's Global Head Of Digital said that at this stage the bank does not recognize crypto as a genuine investment asset, but is “cautiously looking”

item.title: 2018 Crypto Investment Report: Institutional Investors Provide 56% of Capital Inflow
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marie Huillet
item.description: The first-ever investment report released by major crypto fund Grayscale Investments reveals that 56% of capital inflow this year is from institutional investors

item.title: US House Hearing: Crypto Presents a Challenge Beyond Hard and Fast Asset Classifications
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marie Huillet
item.description: Witnesses at the a hearing before the U.S. House of Agriculture Committee today argued that digital assets require an agile regulatory approach because of their mutability

item.title: Bitcoin Above $7,000 as Positive Momentum Continues Following Yesterday's Market Upswing
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marie Huillet
item.description: Crypto markets are mostly continuing to build on a major upswing that kicked off yesterday, with virtually all of the top ten coins by market cap seeing ongoing growth

item.title: Robinhood Adds Support for Dogecoin on Its Crypto Platform
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Alexandre
item.description: Financial service mobile app Robinhood has added support for Dogecoin on its crypto trading platform, following its recent extension to Litecoin and Bitcoin Cash

item.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple, Bitcoin Cash, EOS, Litecoin, Cardano, Stellar, IOTA, TRON: Price Analysis, July 16
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: What cryptocurrencies have bottomed out? See the latest price analysis to find out

item.title: EOS Developer Block.One Secures Investments from PayPal's Peter Thiel, Bitmain's Jihan Wu
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marie Huillet
item.description: EOS developer Block.one has closed investments from billionaire PayPal co-founder Peter Thiel and Bitmain billionaire Jihan Wu

item.title: Coinbase Announces Five Possible New Assets, Makes No Guarantees For Trade Listing
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Alexandre
item.description: Coinbase is considering the addition of five new assets to its exchange and will negotiate with local banks and regulators to add them to different jurisdictions

item.title: Texas State Securities Board Issues Cease and Desist Order to Crypto Promoters
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: The Texas State Securities Board has recently taken emergency action against a network of fraudulent crypto-related firms

item.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple, Bitcoin Cash, EOS, Litecoin, Cardano, Stellar, IOTA, TRON: Price Analysis, July 13
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: As some retail investors are leaving crypto, large institutional players are moving in, as they see value around the current price levels. Do the charts support their sentiment?

item.title: Tether Appoints BMO Anti-Money Laundering Manager as Chief Compliance Officer
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Alexandre
item.description: Tether has appointed a former Bank of Montreal anti-money laundering manager to lead its regulatory compliance program

item.title: League of Legends Philippines Removes ‘Cryptojacking’ Code From Its Client
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: League of Legends Philippines has removed crypto-mining malware from its Garena client after two days of the attack

item.title: Robinhood’s Zero-Fee Crypto Trading Platform Adds Support for Litecoin, Bitcoin Cash
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Molly Jane Zuckerman
item.description: The crypto platform from financial services app Robinhood now supports LTC and BCH

item.title: Kaspersky Lab: $10 Mln in Ethereum Stolen Over Past Year via Social Engineering Tricks
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Markus Kasanmascheff
item.description: Security experts at Kaspersky Lab report that online crypto scammers target those interested in ICOs, using phishing emails and fake Twitter giveaways to attract victims

item.title: GPU Prices Fall Following Slump in Cryptocurrency Markets
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Alexandre
item.description: GPU prices have been declining following a sharp price drop of virtual currency prices during the first half of 2018

item.title: Crypto Markets Slightly Down, EOS Sees Some of Biggest Losses
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Crypto markets are experiencing the second day of losses with Bitcoin hovering between $6,300 and $6,400

item.title: Ethereum’s Joe Lubin: ‘We’re Moving Towards a World of Decentralized Governance’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marie Huillet
item.description: Rise conference Hong Kong 2018: Joe Lubin, Mike Novogratz, other leading crypto industry figures weigh in on the major implications of cryptocurrencies for the global economy

item.title: Litecoin Foundation Partners With TokenPay to Acquire 10% Stake in German Bank
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marie Huillet
item.description: The Litecoin Foundation has now acquired a 9.9% stake in Germany’s WEG Bank AG, as a result of a new strategic partnership with crypto-fiat payments firm TokenPay

item.title: Google Co-Founder Sergey Brin Reveals He Is an Ethereum Miner
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marie Huillet
item.description: Google’s co-founder Sergey Brin has made the surprise revelation that he is an Ethereum miner, saying he believes that the crypto global network is “extraordinary”

item.title: Crypto Markets Take Deep Plunge, Market Cap Back to Monthly Lows
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Crypto markets have taken a deep plunge after ten days of somewhat stable growth, Bitcoin is back to around $6,400

item.title: Ethereum's Joe Lubin: We're Moving Into Phase Two of ETH Blockchain ‘This Year’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marie Huillet
item.description: Ethereum’s Joseph Lubin says that with the fundamental “layer one” in the Ethereum ecosystem now established, 2018 will see “layer two” systems ramify and mature

item.title: Crypto Markets Seeing Red, Total Market Cap Down Almost $15 Bln
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Crypto markets are in the red today, with total market capitalization down almost $15 billion from yesterday’s high

item.title: Exclusive: Following ‘Security Breach,’ Bancor Expects to Be Online in 24 Hours
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Alexandre
item.description: Following a security breach, decentralized crypto exchange Bancor said it expects to come back online within 24 hours

item.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple, Bitcoin Cash, EOS, Litecoin, Cardano, Stellar, IOTA, NEO: Price Analysis, July 09
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Even despite pressure from China and India - which comprise 35 percent of the global population - cryptocurrencies are bouncing off their lows. Which coins are confirming a bottom? Let’s check the charts

item.title: Decentralized Crypto Exchange Bancor Reports ‘Security Breach,’ Remains Down for ‘Maintenance’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Decentralized cryptocurrency exchange Bancor reports “security breach,” receives help in freezing funds from fellow crypto service Changelly

item.title: Bitcoin vs Altcoins: Which Cryptocurrency Is the Most Usable as Money?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Simon Chandler
item.description: Bitcoin remains the cryptocurrency most usable as actual money, but other coins are catching up

item.title: Ethereum’s Vitalik Buterin Blasts Centralized Crypto Exchanges: ‘I Hope They Burn in Hell’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Ethereum’s Vitalik Buterin blasted centralized exchanges, saying that he hopes they will “burn in hell”

item.title: From $2.9 Billion in a Month to Hundreds Dead: Trends of the Rollercoaster ICO Market in 18 Months
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Darryn Pollock
item.description: The ICO market can see up to $2.9 billion being made in a month, but it can also see hundreds of projects die. Overview of trends and numbers of the 2017-2018 ICOs market

item.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple, Bitcoin Cash, EOS, Litecoin, Cardano, Stellar, IOTA, NEO: Price Analysis, July 06
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Fundstrat’s Tom Lee has doubled down on his $25,000 target for Bitcoin by year end of 2018. Is that really possible from the technical analysis point of view? Let’s look at the charts
